content: Do you think that The Big "O" would allow tickling the bottoms of the prisoners feet with a feather .Are would that be construed as cruel and harsh punishment???.Are maybe the telling of offal jokes???.Oh I know make them take large amounts of caster oil.Now that to me is cruel and harsh punishment!!!. content: This is a strange post. To begin with, there's no reference to a story. Next, you seem to be saying that you have a problem with the determination by the professionals that a specific technique has been determined ineffective. So if a technique is determined to be ineffective for reliable intellegence we should "pull the wings off of flies" just because we can? I don't quite understand where you're headed with this post.

content: I think his point is rather simple. Obama and his goons would prohibit an interrogation method whether effective or not - simply because it might be considered "mean" or "impolite." I can't say I disagree with him either. The Obama administration is far more interested in appeasement than in getting the job done.
